text: The court shall award costs and reasonable attorney's fees to a resident who prevails in an action brought under § 7-705.01 or § 7-705.02.
historical:

DC CODE § 7-705.03

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)
